content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can we assist you today? Are you looking for plumbing, electrical, or HVAC help?
Hi, yeah, I need someone to look at my AC. It's not cooling.
Thank you for letting us know your AC isn’t working properly. Can I please have your name to start scheduling your appointment?
Thanks, Mike! Could you please provide your address so I can confirm we service your area and help you schedule your AC repair?
On second thought, can you just remove me from your contact list? I’m not interested anymore. Please don’t contact me further.
Of course, Mike. We’ll make sure you are not contacted any further. If you need our services in the future, you’re always welcome to reach out. Have a great day!
reason: Customer requested to not be contacted.
